column2: "...Sara."
"When I'm sortieing to various planets, when I'm causing destruction, I've always felt watched."
"It's different from Huey's. It felt, protective."
"I get it now. I've finally realized it."
"Sara, it's you that's been watching me, isn't it?"
"You're right. I've always been watching you, looking after you behind the scenes."
"You, who have been created out of me, created by me."
"Using the sense of regret as motivation, so that I will never forget."
"Regret? Don't make me laugh! If Huey was here, he would definitely beat you up!"
"Peon is my original, and that's it! Luther is the one that created me, used me."
"...I'm simple and dumb. Because of that, I've been mean to others."
"Despite that, Huey forgave me. <%me> too."
"I don't know if other ARKS members will forgive me, but I have already forgiven myself."
"If I didn't, I wouldn't be able to face Huey and everyone else that forgave me!"
"I'm still immature, a fool. Still, I've decided to live on as Claris Claes."
"...You don't have to care about me anymore. Be it clone or original. I'm me, and peon's a peon."
"You've put me on the spot. I've never expected the day where I'd be lectured by such an impertinent kid."
"W-what are you saying, peon?! We're the same height!"
"Hey hey hey, you missies. This ain't the place for a sisterly quarrel."
"We're not sisters!"
"We're not sisters!"
"I'm Claris Claes!"
"I'm Sara, alright?"
